item.title: Glacor Minions
item.dc:creator: @activity-x activity-x
item.description:
@activity-x wrote:

So i added glacors with 800 HP and i was
wondering how could i add the 3 minions
I already got them in the server but i want
the first to spawn when the glacor got 600 HP left
the second when at 400 HP and the third at 200 HP

i found this somewhere but i have no clue where to put it and if it works

if (newNPC.npcType == #### && newNPC.HP <= ##) {
spawnNpc(infohere);
}

its PI 317 TrisidiaXv3

Read full topic
